foo = baz = 0
quz = 1
for bar in range(1, int(input()) + 1):
    foo += int(input())
    if foo * quz < baz * bar: break
    baz, quz = foo, bar
print(baz / quz)

bar = 0

TUX=int(input())
FOO=0
BAR=0
BAZ=0
QUZ=1
for i in range(TUX):
  PUR=int(input())
  FOO=FOO+PUR
  BAR=BAR+1
  if FOO*QUZ>BAZ*BAR:
    BAZ=FOO
    QUZ=BAR

"""
IM IN YR LOOP NERFIN YR TUX TIL BOTH SAEM TUX AN 0
I HAS A PUR
GIMMEH PUR
PUR IS NOW A NUMBR
FOO R SUM OF FOO AN PUR
BAR R SUM OF BAR AN 1
BOTH SAEM BIGGR OF PRODUKT OF FOO AN QUZ AN PRODUKT OF BAR BAZ AN PRODUKT OF FOO AN QUZ
O RLY?
YA RLY
BAZ R FOO
QUZ R BAR
OIC
IM OUTTA YR LOOP
BAZ IS NOW A NUMBAR
VISIBLE SMOOSH QUOSHUNT OF BAZ QUZ
KTHXBYE
"""
tux, foo, bar, baz, quz = int(input()), 0, 0, 0, 1
while tux != 0:
    pur = int(input())
    foo += pur
    bar += 1
    if max(foo * quz, bar * baz) == foo * quz:
        baz = foo
        quz = bar
    tux -= 1
print(float(baz / quz))

tux=int(input())
foo=0
bar=0
baz=0
quz=1
while tux>0:
    tux-=1
    pur=int(input())
    foo+=pur
    bar+=1
    if max(foo*quz,bar*baz) == foo*quz:
        baz=foo
        quz=bar
print(baz/quz)

tux = int(input())

    pur = int(input())

    
    foo += pur

n = int(input())
A = []
sum = 0
for i in range(n):
    x = int(input())
    sum += x
    A.append(sum/(i+1))

print('%.6f\n' % max(A))
